definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)

sentences.english: By use of stagger arrangement, the detector array has 100% fill-factor.
sentences.chinese: 器件采用品字形排列，占空比为100%。

sentences.english: Identification of the Chinese drug Malanye and its adulterants.
sentences.chinese: 中药马蓝叶及其混乱品的比较鉴别。

sentences.english: And it would appear that there isn’t an end in sight to these Twitter clones.
sentences.chinese: 并且这是Twitter的克隆品似乎是没完没了。

sentences.english: If Exposure decreases, the Transferee is obliged to return equivalent Collateral.
sentences.chinese: 当风险敞口降低时，受让人有责任返还相同的担保品。

sentences.english: AQUA peptides as identity standards for post-translational modifications.
sentences.chinese: AQUA多肽作为鉴定翻译后修饰的标准品。

sentences.english: Stabilized body care products, household products, textiles and fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 稳定的身体护理品，家用制品，纺织品和织物。

sentences.english: What is the difference between the contents of drugs when it is calculated on the anhydrous basis and on the dried basis?
sentences.chinese: 药品含量以干燥品计算或无水物计算有何不同？

sentences.english: Pinyintang Printing Co. , Ltd. (Henan) possesses a professional as well as effective team.
sentences.chinese: 品印堂品牌拥有一支专业的高效的团队。

sentences.english: Distinguish the location, quantity and contents of conformance & non-conformance product.
sentences.chinese: 区分良品和不良品的位置，内容，数量。

sentences.english: Pierre quality, shelf-life of 20 years, to ensure consistent quality of each batch.
sentences.chinese: 优质臻品，保质20年，保证每个批次质量一致。

sentences.english: Eat Daze Mountain Grape, farmhouse style products.
sentences.chinese: 吃大泽山葡萄，品农家风情。

sentences.english: Conclusion This method is simple, accurate, sensitive, and can be used to identify Jinniukou and similar species.
sentences.chinese: 结论本法简便准确灵敏，可用于鉴别金钮扣及类同品。

sentences.english: Officially, at least, blood was transformed from a product into a gift.
sentences.chinese: 血液从此正式从商品转化成为了馈赠品。

sentences.english: But many wineries are having a hard time getting a line on Chinese oenophiles.
sentences.chinese: 但很多酒商很难获得中国品酒家的理解。

sentences.english: This drug is available either in liquid or in lyophilized form.
sentences.chinese: 本药备有溶液或冻干品两种剂型。

sentences.english: The all other items met the requirements for national standard of China.
sentences.chinese: 其它项目均达到国家标准品要求。

definition: to sample/to taste/to appreciate/one's taste (i.e. in music, literature, fashion, food and drink etc)/good taste
character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
